Bash(git commit -m "fix(capture): display task previews with ''done'' status after successful capture

Fix issue where completed task previews weren''t showing up properly.

## Changes

- Changed task preview steps status from ''pending'' → ''done'' (line 455)
- Added debug logging to track micro_steps creation
- Fixed task_id field reference (was response.task_id, now response.task?.task_id)
- Added console warnings when micro_steps are missing from API response

## Why

Task previews were showing with ''pending'' status even though they were completed.
This caused visual inconsistency where completed tasks looked incomplete.

## Result

Task previews now correctly show all steps with green ''done'' status and checkmarks.")
